channel.title: CVE Feed for webwizardsdev -- B2BKing — Ultimate WooCommerce Wholesale and B2B Solution
channel.description: The latest CVEs for webwizardsdev -- B2BKing — Ultimate WooCommerce Wholesale and B2B Solution

item.title: CVE-2023-3126|2024-08-02T06:48:07.204Z -- webwizardsdev -- b2bking%20%E2%80%94%20ultimate%20woocommerce%20wholesale%20and%20b2b%20solution
item.description: The B2BKing plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to unauthorized access of data due to a missing capability check on the 'b2bkingdownloadpricelist' function in versions up to, and including, 4.6.00. This makes it possible for Authenticated attackers with subscriber or customer-level permissions to retrieve the full pricing list of all products on the site.

item.title: CVE-2023-3125|2024-08-02T06:48:07.365Z -- webwizardsdev -- b2bking%20%E2%80%94%20ultimate%20woocommerce%20wholesale%20and%20b2b%20solution
item.description: The B2BKing plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to unauthorized modification of data due to a missing capability check on the 'b2bking_save_price_import' function in versions up to, and including, 4.6.00. This makes it possible for Authenticated attackers with subscriber or customer-level permissions to modify the pricing of any product on the site.
